name: diorama
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a model that shows a situation, such as a historical event or animals in their natural environment, in a way that looks real: Dioramas are three-dimensional. At the museum there was a diorama of local wildlife.
Katrin Ray Shumakov/Moment/GettyImages
